News.Title: Megatherm Induction Projects 15-20% Growth This Financial Year
News.Summary: Megatherm Induction expects 15-20% growth this financial year and anticipates a major increase in its order book. The company plans multi-fold growth over the next 3-4 years.

News.Title: Megatherm Induction Secures Bulk Orders Worth 630 Million Rupees
News.Summary: Megatherm Induction has announced that it has received bulk orders valued at 630 million rupees. This significant order intake suggests a positive development for the company's business operations and potential revenue growth.

News.Title: Megatherm Induction Secures Bulk Orders Worth 630 Million Rupees
News.Summary: Megatherm Induction has announced that it has received bulk orders valued at 630 million rupees. This significant order intake demonstrates strong demand for the company's products or services and could potentially boost its revenue and market position.
